synopsis.text:
Interactive Experience: The entire army of State Alchemists, including Ed and Al, gather in a distant location to engage in a fierce battle against the formidable Homunculi. With the addition of an anxious newcomer, can the military forces triumph?

Live Action Featurette: Witness Ed, Al, Mustang, and other beloved State Alchemists in an alternate reality Amestris as they clash with the lethal Homunculi in this thrilling 10-minute film.

Kids Short: In this heartwarming 3-minute tale set in present-day 2005, Edward enjoys a day with his grandchildren, proving that even after losing innocence, it can be rediscovered.

Chibi Wrap Party: Every character from the series, including some familiar foes, come together in this amusing 6-minute Super Deformed style skit for an after-party celebration of the Conqueror of Shambala movie. With alcohol flowing and everyone under one roof, chaos is bound to ensue. Just make sure to arrive before Gluttony, or you might miss out on the finger foods â€“ and possibly some fingers!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
